definition: Wen Jiabao (1942-), Premier of PRC from 2003-2013
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Wen was eating japanese seafood at the crisis area.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶在喫日本輻射區海鮮。

sentences.english: Cameron held a grand welcome ceremony for Wen prior to the talks.
sentences.chinese: 會談前，卡梅倫爲溫家寶舉行了隆重的歡迎儀式。

sentences.english: Prior to the talks, Wen Jiabao held a welcoming ceremony for Christies visit to China.
sentences.chinese: 會談前，溫家寶爲克里斯蒂訪華舉行了歡迎儀式。

sentences.english: Premier Wen Jiabao also met with Deputy President Motlanthe yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，溫家寶總理也會見了莫特蘭蒂副總統。

sentences.english: Gilani held a grand welcome ceremony for Wen at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 吉拉尼在機場爲溫家寶舉行了隆重的歡迎儀式。

sentences.english: The relationship between China and Macedonia has developed smoothly over the past years, Wen said.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶說，近年來中馬關係發展順利。

sentences.english: On the same day Wen also met with former Malaysian Prime Minister Dr. Mahathir bin Mohamad.
sentences.chinese: 同日，溫家寶還會見了馬來西亞前總理馬哈蒂爾。

sentences.english: At Halim airport, Jakarta, Premier Wen delivered a written speech.
sentences.chinese: 在機場，溫家寶發表了書面講話。

sentences.english: Prior to the talks, Thein Sein held a welcome ceremony for Wen.
sentences.chinese: 會談前，登盛爲溫家寶舉行了歡迎儀式。

sentences.english: Premier Wen attached great importance to the engagement and communication with the people from all walks of life.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶總理非常重視同兩國各界民衆的溝通交流。

sentences.english: Wen said that bilateral relations enjoy sound development momentum.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶說，中捷關係發展勢頭良好。

sentences.english: Prior to the talks, Wen held a welcome ceremony for Zia.
sentences.chinese: 會談前，溫家寶爲齊亞舉行歡迎儀式。

sentences.english: More than 500 people have written on Mr. Wen’s Facebook “wall,” in Chinese and English.
sentences.chinese: 超過500人在溫家寶總理的留言牆上用中英文留言。

sentences.english: Wen said parliamentary exchanges are a vital part of Japan-China ties.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶表示，議會交流是中日關係的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Wen Jiabao held that the current international situations are not free from complexity, uncertainties and turmoil.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶表示，當前國際形勢複雜和動盪不安。

sentences.english: He and Premier Wen Jiabao regularly proclaim an aspiration to hexie shehui, or a harmonious society.
sentences.chinese: 他和總理溫家寶經常宣告和諧社會的願望。
